name: Leonard L. SMARR, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of June, 2002, the Motion to Dismiss for Mootness is granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
